thread.title: Declan Chellar
thread.title_full: O'Briens Wine reviewed by Declan Chellar

author: Declan Chellar
title: Declan Chellar
text:
I wanted to buy wine as a gift for my niece but it was more convenient for her to collect it in-store than to have it delivered. However, the website only lets you pay online for a delivery. If it's a collection, you have to pay in-store. This makes no sense, seeing as they already have the ability to take payment online. I rang the shop in Lucan. The man was very sympathetic but he was not allowed to take payment over the phone and he was therefore unable to resolve the issue. I could hardly ask my niece to pay for her own gift, so I had to make it a delivery, which was not convenient for her at all.
For a living I help businesses design how they should operate, so I can see areas for improvement in this process.
